articles.title: Katrina Kaif wears Rs 3k gold and silver juttis for Lohri celebrations with Vicky Kaushal. See pics - India Today
articles.description: Katrina Kaif celebrated Lohri with husband Vicky Kaushal last week. For the occasion, Katrina was dressed in a bright red salwar suit which she layered with a warm black bomber jacket.
